title: Free Speech Under Attack, Oct 11th 2016
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. We have crossed the Rubicon. America and her neighbor to the North, Canada are under attack and the 5th column is not from the Russians, the Iranians or the North Koreans, its from our own kids. Young adults, university students and those that feel that words hurt and they should be protected from ideas that don't fit their utopian ideal. So when do we say,GROW UP? Lets find out shall we. Podcast: Galtspeaks.com Contact: Radio@galtspeaks.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show & our new home on Redstatetalkradio.com Support the podcast, use the next level of autonomy, cryptocurrency: BTC: Azen7A8rsEwQ84SCB3ZsbuYALpNCGgqNc
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
